title: Mention one advantage of crop rotation.

tasks.task: Cultivating plants and dealing with pests and weeds
subtasks: Operating farming equipment for cultivation
Identifying and removing weeds manually or with tools
Monitoring plant growth and detecting pests or diseases
Applying pesticides or other treatments for pest control

tasks.task: Managing plant health and yield
subtasks: Recognizing signs of pests affecting specific crops
Implementing farming techniques to improve yield and quality

tasks.task: Communicating and sharing knowledge
subtasks: Searching for answers via WhatsApp or similar platforms
Assisting students with doubts or issues related to agriculture

Cultivating plants and dealing with pests and weeds. Okay, now subtasks. The subtasks related to this would be operating farming equipment for cultivation. So SUBTASK: Operating tractors or other equipment used in cultivation. Then, dealing with weeds. So weeding. That can be done manually or with tools, maybe SUBTASK: Using herbicides or SUBTASK: Manual weeding. Then, dealing with pests and diseases. So that would require monitoring the plants for signs of pests or diseases. That's another subtask. Maybe SUBTASK: Visual inspection of plants. And then taking action if needed. So applying pesticides would be a subtask. Also, maybe identifying specific pests or diseases. So the subtask could be "Identifying plant pests or diseases."

tasks.task: Managing plant health and yield. Under this, the subtasks would be recognizing signs of pests affecting specific crops and implementing techniques to improve yield. Also, maybe dealing with plant diseases.

Managing plant health and another for communicating. But maybe the communication part is separate. If that's tied to agricultural knowledge, sure. So as a subtask under managing plant health or communication. Hmm.
Providing agricultural support to students. Subtask: Using WhatsApp to answer questions. Then, maybe a subtask under that is helping students with their agricultural problems.

Communicate and share agricultural knowledge. Subtasks there could be using WhatsApp or other platforms to answer questions, assisting students.
